description: List job production plan broadcast messages with filtering and pagination.
permissions: Admins per ApplicationPolicy. Non-admin users can list messages if they are recipients (their user ID is in user_ids), if they can access the related job production plan via policy scope, or if they are a driver on broker tender job schedule shifts for the job production plan.
validation_notes: Hidden messages are excluded by default (is_hidden filter default is false). --is-hidden must be true or false.

flags.name: --job-production-plan
flags.description: Filter by job production plan ID (comma-separated for multiple). Example: 123

flags.name: --created-by
flags.description: Filter by created-by user ID. Example: 456

flags.name: --is-hidden
flags.description: Filter by hidden status (true/false). Example: true
